MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L10 postcode area of Liverpool affecting properties in Cranwell Close and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  08:49AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midday today. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:03AM on 30th November 2020
